project3.title: Tabular data classification using CNN
project3.desc: Suggested a new approach for dealing with tabular data using DL, specifically employing convolutional networks.

project1.title: Survival Analysis ML Project
project1.metadata: Survival Analysis and ML Methods, 3654-3201 TAU
project1.desc: Conducted an investigation comparing known DL models to traditional ML models in the context of survival analysis problems. Utilized established benchmarks to perform a comprehensive comparison between these methods. Executed multiple tests and thoroughly explored the results.
